dev.kkorolyov.pancake.math

Class Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.kkorolyov.pancake.math.Vector

  • public class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
    A vector defined as a head at some point in 3 dimensions and a tail at (0, 0, 0).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Vector()
      Constructs a vector with a head at (0, 0, 0).
      Vector(float x, float y)
      Constructs a vector with a head at (x, y, 0).
      Vector(float x, float y, float z)
      Constructs a vector with a head at (x, y, z).
      Vector(Vector original)
      Constructs a copy of a vector.

      • add

        public void add(Vector other)
        Transforms this vector by adding another vector to it. This is equivalent to translating this vector by the other vector's components.
        Parameters:
        other - vector to add
        See Also:
        add(Vector, float)

      • add

        public void add(Vector other,
                float scale)
        Transforms this vector by adding a scaled vector to it.
        Parameters:
        other - vector to add with scaling
        scale - proportion of other vector's component values to add
        See Also:
        add(Vector)

      • sub

        public void sub(Vector other)
        Transforms this vector by subtracting another vector from it. This is equivalent to translating this vector by the negative of the other vector's components.
        Parameters:
        other - vector to subtract
        See Also:
        sub(Vector, float)

        See Also:
